code: @Override public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {     assertEquals(11, exchange.getIn().getBody(CountingHandler.class).getNumber()). }

@Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("file:target/in").routeId("stax-parser").to("stax:" + CountingHandler.class.getName()).process(new Processor() {          @Override         public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {             assertEquals(11, exchange.getIn().getBody(CountingHandler.class).getNumber()).         }     }).to("mock:records"). }

@Override public RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("file:target/in").routeId("stax-parser").to("stax:" + CountingHandler.class.getName()).process(new Processor() {                  @Override                 public void process(Exchange exchange) throws Exception {                     assertEquals(11, exchange.getIn().getBody(CountingHandler.class).getNumber()).                 }             }).to("mock:records").         }     }. }

@Test public void testStax() throws Exception {     recordsEndpoint.expectedMessageCount(1).     recordsEndpoint.message(0).body().isInstanceOf(CountingHandler.class).     recordsEndpoint.assertIsSatisfied(). }
